Uses of Class
java.lang.SecurityException

Packages that use SecurityException
android.app High-level classes encapsulating the overall Android application model. 
android.media Provides classes that manage various media interfaces in audio and video. 
android.os Provides basic operating system services, message passing, and inter-process communication on the device. 
java.io Provides input and output facilities by means of streaming, file system access and serialization. 
java.lang Provides core classes of the Android environment. 
java.lang.reflect Provides reflective run-time access to the properties of a class, which allows such things as querying or modifying an objects's field by its name or invoking a method by name. 
java.security This package provides all the classes and interfaces that constitute the Java security framework. 
java.util.logging This package allows to add logging to any application.

          Returns an array containing Constructor objects for all public constructors for the class represented by this Class.

          Returns a Constructor object which represents the constructor matching the specified parameter types that is declared by the class represented by this Class.

          Returns a Field object for the field with the specified name which is declared in the class represented by this Class.

          Returns a Method object which represents the method matching the specified name and parameter types that is declared by the class represented by this Class.

Uses of SecurityException in java.security
 

Subclasses of SecurityException in java.security
 class AccessControlException
          AccessControlException is thrown if the access control infrastructure denies protected access due to missing permissions.

          Invokes SecurityManager.checkPermission(Permission) with this permission as its argument.
